name: WooCommerce Custom Overlays
author: Andrew Gunn

sections.description: Now your WooCommerce products that are out of stock can be distinguished from in stock products with a dyanmically applied image overlay to all product images that are out of stock. You can use the preloaded pictures included in the plugin, or upload and set your own on the plugin settings page.
sections.installation: Either upload a .zip file, or install through the WordPress.org repository.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

Either upload a .zip file, or install through the WordPress.org repository.

short_description: Dynamically display a custom uploaded or default image overlays for products in your WooCommerce store by category, status, product, inventory status, …
description: Now your WooCommerce products that are out of stock can be distinguished from in stock products with a dyanmically applied image overlay to all product images that are out of stock. You can use the preloaded pictures included in the plugin, or upload and set your own on the plugin settings page.

upgrade_notice: Version 2.0 allows users to completely customize their overlay images, extending the Out of Stock product selection to any specific target the user wants. Now you can add overlays any way you want, to any products you want by selecting specific products, product status\', categories etc.
